about_the_game:
Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.

Become enthralled by the insidious immortals that have secretly dominated world affairs for centuries in ‘Isaac’s Story’, the first narrative in an anthology of vampiric tales, elegantly presented in an interactive gothic style visual novel format.

‘Harrowed World: What’s Past is Portents’, is a gothic vampire visual novel that serves as a haunting prelude to ‘Harrowed World: Portents In Red’, an upcoming modern gothic vampire RPG.

Step into the shoes of Isaac Ambrose, an altar boy at the quaint local church.

Your curiosity gets the better of you as you come across something that will change the course of your life forever.

Some things are better left secret, kept hidden away from prying eyes.

What awaits you behind the veil is a world far more intricate and unsettling than you’d ever dared conceive.

• NEW: Voice Acting!

• NEW: Internal Achievements System!

• NEW: Lexicon System!

• Isaac's Story Duration: 15 minutes approx.

• Future Stories as DLC (coming soon).

• Controller Support (partially tested).

• Designed to be played multiple times.

• Unravel captivating layers of lore.

• Uncover the canon ending and multiple alternative game over endings.

• Mac and Linux Support (untested).

A dark and twisted version of our world where supernatural creatures hide among humanity. Vampires, magical folk, and other beings compete for power and influence through secret societies, corporate power, and religious sects.

Harrowed World takes creatures of myth and folklore reimagining them as concealed predators and tricksters. This vision of the world is dystopian and bleak with both human and inhuman horrors, but most people are blissfully ignorant of the dark forces at work around them.


Harrowed World is the shared setting and franchise of a growing number of video games and (soon) books, combing elements of gothic horror, adventure, dystopian fiction, drama, science fiction, Lovecraftian horror, and urban fantasy. Experience Harrowed World from a variety of perspectives from the prowling vampire to the monster hunting Beholder.

Support

If you are a member of the Discord server and you need support, you can simply use the support channel.

Alternatively, you can get in touch via the contact form on the website.

content_descriptors.notes: This title may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work, like frequent violence or gore. Some players may find elements of the title’s stories and characters uncomfortable, including references to suicide, abuse, and religion. This title is not suitable for those who are easily offended or upset by such content.
